name.ja: <ruby>Ｂ・Ｆ・Ｗ<rt>ビー・フォース・ウィンド</rt></ruby>

text.en: Up to twice per turn, if a "Battlewasp" monster(s) is Normal or Special Summoned to your field (except during the Damage Step): You can target 1 of them; add 1 "Battlewasp" monster with less ATK from your Deck to your hand. Once per turn: You can target 1 Insect monster you control that has a Level; if you use it as Synchro Material this turn, you can treat it as a Tuner. You can only activate 1 "Battlewasp - Wind" per turn.
